alert.note: Alert for Aurora; Bon Homme; Davison; Douglas; Hanson; Hutchinson; Jerauld; Sanborn; Yankton (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued April 19 at 2:15AM MDT until April 19 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 7 PM CDT THIS EVENING FOR WIND AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR PORTIONS OF SOUTH CENTRAL SOUTH DAKOTA AND SOUTHEAST SOUTH DAKOTA... The National Weather Service in Sioux Falls has issued a Red Flag Warning for wind and low relative humidity, which is in effect from 1 PM this afternoon to 7 PM CDT this evening. * AFFECTED AREA...In South Dakota, Jerauld, Sanborn, Aurora, Davison, Hanson, Douglas, Hutchinson, Bon Homme and Yankton. * WINDS...Southeast 25 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 20 percent. * IMPACTS...Any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now....or will shortly. A combination of strong winds...low relative humidity...and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Aurora; Bon Homme; Davison; Douglas; Hanson; Hutchinson; Jerauld; Sanborn; Yankton
